description: This file contains utility functions for interacting with the WhatsApp API via Facebook Graph API, including media upload/download, message sending, and typing indicators, with both synchronous and asynchronous implementations.

methods.name: get_access_token
methods.description: Retrieves the WhatsApp access token from environment variables.

methods.name: get_phone_number_id
methods.description: Retrieves the WhatsApp phone number ID from environment variables.

methods.name: get_media
methods.description: Fetches media content from Facebook Graph API synchronously.

methods.name: get_media_async
methods.description: Fetches media content from Facebook Graph API asynchronously.

methods.name: upload_media
methods.description: Uploads media to Facebook Graph API synchronously.

methods.name: upload_media_async
methods.description: Uploads media to Facebook Graph API asynchronously.

methods.name: send_image_message
methods.description: Sends an image message via WhatsApp synchronously.

methods.name: send_image_message_async
methods.description: Sends an image message via WhatsApp asynchronously.

methods.name: typing_indicator
methods.description: Sends a typing indicator (read status) synchronously.

methods.name: typing_indicator_async
methods.description: Sends a typing indicator (read status) asynchronously.
